title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-4.3 - Transfer facilities and other intermediary facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-4.3 - Transfer facilities and other intermediary facilities

State Regulations

Any transfer facility or other intermediary facility that
receives notification that food scraps are required to be sent to an organics
recycler must ensure that the food scraps are taken to an organics recycler. A
transfer facility must take all reasonable precautions to not commingle the
material with any other solid waste unless such commingled waste can be
processed by the organics recycler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
350-4.3

Adopted

New

York State Register August 11, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 32, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
